name: Cheese Thief (LutzArt3D)
description:
You Play Sebastian, an adolescent Rat whose father has recently passed on at a foraging party. Now, your baby sister is sick, and you’re running out of Food! With the help of your wise old friend Gurdy, you set out on the first of many adventures into The Structure. On Your journey, you will encounter many obstacles and trials that reveal and test Sebastian’s new bravery while unlocking his father’s secret agenda.
- “An exciting new perspective riddled with themes and intriguing game mechanics.”-Me
